data.name: Mirror Party - Unlock All Original Soundtracks
data.detailed_description:
Please note that it is not recommended to purchase this DLC. All the content in this DLC can be acquired in-game and purchasing this DLC may significantly impact your experience of the game.

Purchasing this DLC will unlock all vocal songs and theme music(Including future updates).
